official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for maximum capital gains tax rate of 15, 22, and 30 percent for individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set the capital gains rate (currently 28 percent) at 15 percent for capital gains not over $20,000, 22 percent for capital gains between $20,000 and $40,000, and 30 percent for capital gains over $40,000.
